column1: '''''Arda Philology 2''''' is the second volume of the journal ''[[Arda (annual)
column2: Arda Philology]]'', and contains the proceedings of the Second International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages, ''[[Omentielva
column3: Omentielva Tatya]]'', which was held in Antwerp in August [[2007]].

column1: * [[Benct Philip Jonsson]]: "Reconstruction and 'Retro-construction' in Tolkien's Eldarin Languages"
